alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Grady; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jackson, northeastern Washington, northern Decatur, northwestern Grady, southeastern Miller, southern Mitchell, southwestern Baker and Seminole Counties through 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/... At 759 PM EDT/659 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Camilla to 6 miles southeast of Donalsonville to 6 miles northwest of Marianna to near Vernon. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Donalsonville, Pelham, Marianna, Camilla, Bainbridge, Bradford, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Wausau, Sale City, Iron City, Brinson, Bascom, Lovedale, Dellwood and Donaldsonville A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Decatur; Grady; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole
